content.title: Publish the App
content.body:
1. From the Publish Live Preview window, under Mobile, select the checkboxes next to the OS of the mobile device on which you are going to view the app.
    For example: iOS and Android.
    Ensure that you have unselected the checkboxes for all the other platforms and channels.
  2. Click Publish.
    After the app is published, the Live Preview is ready window appears.
